game.title: Eclipse Rising
game.synopsis: In a world where the sun has been eclipsed by an eternal shadow, humanity teeters on the brink of extinction. The last remnants of civilization are plagued by twisted creatures born from the darkness, and ancient technologies lie hidden beneath the ruins. Players take on the role of a survivor who stumbles upon a mysterious underground bunker containing the knowledge to restore the sun.
game.beginning: The game begins in the desolate wasteland outside the bunker, where the protagonist is attacked by twisted creatures and left for dead. As they awaken within the safety of the bunker, they soon discover that it's an ancient research facility filled with cryptic logs and abandoned technologies.
game.ending: After journeying across the world to reactivate ancient solar panels and unlock new technologies, the protagonist reaches the final showdown against the mastermind behind the eternal shadow: a powerful entity born from humanity's own darkness. With the fate of the world hanging in the balance, the player must harness the power of restored sunlight to defeat the entity and shatter the eclipse, ushering in a new era for humanity.
